Package Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    addPatientController
    It is used to get the information from the doctor about the patient and add him as a patient It extends the dialogFrom class
    addPrescription
    It is used to add prescription by the doctor for his patient It extends the dialogFrom class
    doctorController
    This class is used for the doctor interface It show all the functionalities that an doctor can do function: ADD PATIEN, ADD PRESCRIPTION, VIEW REVIEW FOR MEDICINE; VIEW PATIENT
    entryController
    It is the entry controller class
    loginController
    This class is used to check the user login based on the role navigate to doctor or patient
    patientController
    This class is used for the patient interface It show all the functionalities that a patient can do function: VIEW PRESCRIPTION, VIEW FAMILY MEMBERS PRESCRIPTION
    viewfPrescription
    THIS CLASS IS USED TO DISPLAY THE FAMILY PRESCRIPTION IT EXTENDS THE DIALOGFORM CLASS
    viewPatientController
    It is used to list the patient list of the particular doctor IT EXTENDS THE DIALOGFORM CLASS
    viewPrescription
    this is used to show the prescription
    viewReviewController
    It is used to show the review written by the patient on the tablet on which he is prescribed extend the dialogForm class
    viewUpdateProfile
    It displays all the details about the patient and It can updated by the patient
    writeReviewController
    It is used get the review details from the patient and store in the database
